data: ED Intubation (Module)
Patient Care
Refer to evidence link for Richmond Agitation Sedation Scale (RASS) and Behavioral Pain Scale (BPS) scoring
Richmond Agitation Sedation Scale
q2h and PRN post intubation
RASS Goal
RASS goal of 0, Alert and Calm
RASS goal of -1, Drowsy, sustained eye opening and eye contact for more than 10 seconds to voice
RASS goal of -2, Light sedation, eye opening and eye contact for less than 10 seconds to voice
RASS goal of -3, Moderate sedation, movement but no eye contact to voice
RASS goal of -4, Deep sedation, no response to voice, only rousable to pain
RASS goal of -5, Unrousable
Pain Assessment
Assess pain using Behavioral Pain Scale pre and post interventions and q2h with goal BPS less than 6
Insert Orogastric (OG) Tube
Post-intubation, aspirate stomach contents
Insert Nasogastric Tube
Post-intubation, aspirate stomach contents
Insert Urinary Catheter
Post-intubation, with urometer
Activity
Maintain Head of Bed
30 degrees, post-intubation
Continuous Infusions
sodium chloride 0.9% (NS) bolus
1,000 mL, IV, once, drug form: bag, first dose: STAT
plasmalyte bolus
1,000 mL, IV, once, drug form: bag, first dose: STAT
sodium chloride 0.9% (NS) continuous infusion
order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
order rate: 250 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
order rate: 30 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
plasmalyte continuous infusion
order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
order rate: 250 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
order rate: 30 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
lactated ringers continuous infusion
order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
order rate: 250 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
order rate: 30 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag, first dose: NOW
Medications
ketamine
200 mg, IV, as directed, drug form: inj
proPOFol
200 mg, IV, as directed, drug form: inj
etomidate
40 mg, IV, as directed, drug form: inj

Contraindications to succinylcholine: 
- Malignant hyperthermia history 
- Strokes with hemiparesis greater than 72 hrs 
- Burns / trauma 
- Age greater than 72 years 
- Neuromuscular disease 
- Myopathies / muscular dystrophies 
- Hyperkalemia 
- Guillain-Barre
succinylcholine
150 mg, IV, as directed, drug form: inj
rocuronium
150 mg, IV, as directed, drug form: inj
NORepinephrine titratable infusion (32 mcg/mL) in D5W standard
titrate, IV, minimum rate: 0 mcg/min, maximum rate: 40 mcg/min, titrate instructions: Target Mean Arterial Pressure ABOVE 65 mmHg or SBP above 90 mmHg
8 mg
epinephrine titratable infusion (20 mcg/mL) in D5W standard
titrate, IV, minimum rate: 0 mcg/min, maximum rate: 40 mcg/min, titrate instructions: Target Mean Arterial Pressure ABOVE 65 mmHg or SBP above 90 mmHg
5 mg
PHENYLephrine
100 mcg, IV, q1min, PRN hypotension, drug form: inj
50 mcg, IV, q1min, PRN hypotension, drug form: inj
200 mcg, IV, q1min, PRN hypotension, drug form: inj
lidocaine 2% inj
5 mL, nebulized, once, drug form: inj, first dose: NOW
ketamine
200 mg, IV, as directed, drug form: inj
midazolam PRN range dose
dose range: 2 to 5 mg, IV, once, PRN sedation, drug form: inj
morphine and midazolam are contraindicated in patients with head injury
Analgesics
HYDROmorphone titratable infusion (2 mg/mL) in NS standard
titrate, IV, minimum rate: 0 mg/h, maximum rate: 2 mg/h, titrate instructions: PRN pain
100 mg
HYDROmorphone PRN range dose
dose range: 0.1 to 0.5 mg, IV, q5min, PRN pain, drug form: inj
fentanyl titratable infusion (10 mcg/mL) in NS standard
titrate, IV, minimum rate: 5 mcg/h, maximum rate: 100 mcg/h, titrate instructions: PRN pain
fentanyl PRN range dose
dose range: 25 to 50 mcg, IV, q5min, PRN pain, drug form: inj
ketamine titratable infusion (5 mg/mL) in NS standard
titrate, IV, minimum rate: 0.1 mg/kg/h, maximum rate: 1.3 mg/kg/h, titrate instructions: PRN pain
250 mg
morphine titratable infusion (1 mg/mL) in NS standard
titrate, IV, minimum rate: 0 mg/h, maximum rate: 10 mg/h, titrate instructions: PRN pain
100 mg
morphine PRN range dose
dose range: 1 to 5 mg, IV, q5min, PRN pain, drug form: inj
Sedatives
proPOFol titratable infusion (10 mg/mL) standard
titrate, IV, minimum rate: 5 mcg/kg/min, maximum rate: 80 mcg/kg/min, titrate instructions: PRN sedation
proPOFol titratable infusion (20 mg/mL)
titrate, IV, minimum rate: 5 mcg/kg/min, maximum rate: 80 mcg/kg/min, titrate instructions: PRN sedation
proPOFol PRN range dose
dose range: 10 to 20 mg, IV, q15min, PRN sedation, drug form: inj
midazolam titratable infusion (1 mg/mL) in NS standard
100 mg
titrate, IV, minimum rate: 0 mg/h, maximum rate: 10 mg/h, titrate instructions: PRN sedation
midazolam PRN range dose
dose range: 2 to 5 mg, IV, q5min, PRN sedation, drug form: inj
Diagnostic Tests
XR Chest
STAT, Transport: Portable
